solitary.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to emphasize that there is only one of something
solitary.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the solitary goal of the match
The benches were empty except for a single solitary figure.
solitary.translation[0].definitions[1].d: doing something without anyone else with you
solitary.translation[0].definitions[2].d: spending a lot of time alone, usually because you like being alone
solitary.translation[0].definitions[2].e: He led a rather solitary existence.
solitary.translation[1].definitions[0].e: He spent two weeks in solitary.
